As a first step, we established a suitable model catalyst; one that is conductive to allow for STM measurements and stable under HDS conditions. Following the successful recipe of the Århus group
4, 15 , we synthesized MoS 2 particles on a Au(111) substrate (see “Methods” section), yielding crystalline islands with a predominantly triangular shape (see Fig. 1a). These islands were shown to nearly exclusively expose the Mo edge
15 , which we will focus on hereafter.
